de.boereck.matcher.helpers

Class OptionalMatchHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.boereck.matcher.helpers.OptionalMatchHelpers

  • public class OptionalMatchHelpers
extends Object
    Provides static helper functions for defining matches in CaseMatchers based on Optional values.

    This class is not intended to be instantiated or sub-classed.

    • Field Detail

      • some

        public static final OptionalMapper<Optional<?>,Object> some
        Function that can be used to take any Optional in a match and returns this as an Optional<Object>. This cast is safe, since the value can only be read from the Optional. If the input optional to the function is null, an empty optional will be returned.

      • none

        public static final AdvPredicate<Optional<?>> none
        Predicate checking if an Optional is either null or empty.

      • someI

        public static final OptionalIntMapper<OptionalInt> someI
        Function that can be used to take an OptionalInt in a match and returns this again. If the input optional to the function is null, an empty optional will be returned.

      • noneI

        public static final AdvPredicate<OptionalInt> noneI
        Predicate checking if an OptionalInt is either null or empty.

      • someL

        public static final OptionalLongMapper<OptionalLong> someL
        Function that can be used to take an OptionalLong in a match and returns this again. If the input optional to the function is null, an empty optional will be returned.

      • noneL

        public static final AdvPredicate<OptionalLong> noneL
        Predicate checking if an OptionalLong is either null or empty.

      • someD

        public static final OptionalDoubleMapper<OptionalDouble> someD
        Function that can be used to take an OptionalDouble in a match and returns this again. If the input optional to the function is null, an empty optional will be returned.

      • noneD

        public static final AdvPredicate<OptionalDouble> noneD
        Predicate checking if an OptionalDouble is either null or empty.

    • Method Detail

      • some

        public static <I> OptionalMapper<Optional<I>,I> some()
        Returns a function that is the identity function for Optional values, but returns an empty Optional for a null input value. This is especially usefully when trying to match over an optional value. This can be used to extract the value from the optional in a caseObj case definition.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of element of optional
        Returns:
        function that will return the same Optional it gets as input, as long as the input is not null. On null input returns an empty Optional.

      • some

        public static <I> OptionalMapper<Optional<I>,I> some(Class<I> clazz)
        This is a small wrapper around some(), but takes a class as parameter that is not used but simply used to define the generic type. This can be usefull if further combinators are used on the returned OptionalMapper.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of element of optional
        Parameters:
        clazz - Type defining the type of element of optional
        Returns:
        result of call to some().
        See Also:
        some()

      • some

        public static <I> OptionalMapper<Optional<I>,I> some(Predicate<I> p)
                                              throws NullPointerException
        Returns a function that will return the input Optional filtered with the given predicate. If the input object is null the function returns an empty Optional.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of element held by optional
        Parameters:
        p - predicate used to filter input Optional
        Returns:
        function returning the input optional filtered by predicate p, if the input is not null. If the input is null, an empty optional will be returned.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if p is null.

      • someFlat

        public static <I,O> OptionalMapper<Optional<I>,O> someFlat(Function<I,Optional<O>> extractor)
                                                    throws NullPointerException
        Returns a function that will map the content of the input optional to another optional and returns this optional. If the input optional to the returned function is null, the function will return an empty optional.
        Type Parameters:
        I - Type of object held by input optional
        O - Type of object held by output optional
        Parameters:
        extractor - mapping from the value of the iput optional to another optional, being returned from the result function.
        Returns:
        function mapping from one option based on function extractor to another optional that is returned.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if extractor is null.

      • someMap

        public static <I,O> OptionalMapper<Optional<I>,O> someMap(Function<I,O> mapper)
                                                   throws NullPointerException
        Returns a function that will map the content of the input optional, by calling map on the input optional. If the input optional is null, an empty optional is being returned.
        Type Parameters:
        I - Type of object held by input optional
        O - Type of object held by output optional
        Parameters:
        mapper - will be passed as input parameter to the map function of the input optional to the returned function.
        Returns:
        function mapping the value of the input option based extractor to another value and returns the resulting optional.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null.

      • someI

        public static <I> OptionalIntMapper<OptionalInt> someI(IntPredicate p)
                                                throws NullPointerException
        Returns a function that will return the input OptionalInt filtered with the given predicate. If the input object is null the function returns an empty OptionalInt.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of element held by optional
        Parameters:
        p - predicate used to filter input OptionalInt
        Returns:
        function returning the input optional filtered by predicate p, if the input is not null. If the input is null, an empty optional will be returned.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if p is null.

      • someL

        public static <I> OptionalLongMapper<OptionalLong> someL(LongPredicate p)
                                                  throws NullPointerException
        Returns a function that will return the input OptionalLong filtered with the given predicate. If the input object is null the function returns an empty OptionalLong.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of element held by optional
        Parameters:
        p - predicate used to filter input OptionalLong
        Returns:
        function returning the input optional filtered by predicate p, if the input is not null. If the input is null, an empty optional will be returned.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if p is null.

      • someD

        public static <I> OptionalDoubleMapper<OptionalDouble> someD(DoublePredicate p)
                                                      throws NullPointerException
        Returns a function that will return the input OptionalDouble filtered with the given predicate. If the input object is null the function returns an empty OptionalDouble.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of element held by optional
        Parameters:
        p - predicate used to filter input OptionalDouble
        Returns:
        function returning the input optional filtered by predicate p, if the input is not null. If the input is null, an empty optional will be returned.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if p is null.
